query.query: {"pigql":"q = load \"FinServWaveExt__Task_Account_Contact\";q = filter q by 'FinServ__Regarding__c' in {{selection(FinServ__Regarding__c_108)}}; q = filter q by 'AccountId.FinServ__PrimaryContact__c.Name' in {{results(FinServ__PrimaryContact__c_Name_84)}};q = filter q by date('ActivityDate_Year', 'ActivityDate_Month', 'ActivityDate_Day') in [{{ no_quote(value(field(selection(step_grouplist99), 'Current_pigql'))) }}];q = filter q by !('AccountId.Id' in {{results(Window_function)}});q = filter q by 'TaskSubtype' == \"Task\";q = group q by all;q = foreach q generate count() as 'count';","measures":[["count","*"]],"filters":[]}

{"pigql":"q = load \"FinServWaveExt__Account_Contact\";q = filter q by 'FinServ__PrimaryContact__c.Name' in {{results(FinServ__PrimaryContact__c_Name_84)}};q = filter q by date('CreatedDate_Year', 'CreatedDate_Month', 'CreatedDate_Day') in  [{{ no_quote(value(field(selection(step_grouplist66), 'Current_pigql'))) }}];q = filter q by 'Id' in {{results(Window_function)}};q = group q by all;q= foreach q generate sum('FinServ__TotalFinAcctsPrimaryOwner__c') - sum('FinServ__TotalHeldFinAcctsPrimaryOwner__c') as 'sum_FinServ__TotalHeldFinAcctsPrimaryOwner__c';","measures":[["sum","FinServ__TotalHeldFinAcctsPrimaryOwner__c"]]}

{"pigql":"q = load \"FinServWaveExt__FinGoal_Account_Contact\";q = group q by ('FinServ__Type__c','FinServ__PrimaryOwner__c.Id');q = filter q by 'FinServ__PrimaryOwner__c.Id' in {{results(Window_function)}};q = foreach q generate 'FinServ__Type__c' as 'Goal Type', sum('FinServ__ActualValue__c') as 'sum_value',count() as 'count',\"Actual\" as 'Amount';r = load \"FinServWaveExt__FinGoal_Account_Contact\";r = filter r by 'FinServ__PrimaryOwner__c.Id' in {{results(Window_function)}};r = group r by ('FinServ__Type__c','FinServ__PrimaryOwner__c.Id');r = foreach r generate 'FinServ__PrimaryOwner__c.Id' as 'id','FinServ__Type__c' as 'Goal Type',sum('FinServ__TargetValue__c') as 'sum_value',count() as 'count',\"Target\" as 'Amount';s = union q,r;s= group s by ('Goal Type','Amount');s= foreach s generate 'Goal Type' as 'Goal Type','Amount' as 'Amount',sum('count') as 'sum_count',sum('sum_value') as 'sum_sum_value';","measures":"{{selection(step_selection_Target)}}","groups":["Goal Type","Amount"]}

{"pigql":"q = load \"FinServWaveExt__FinAcc_Revenue\"; q = filter q by date('FinServ__Date__c_Year', 'FinServ__Date__c_Month', 'FinServ__Date__c_Day') in [{{ no_quote(value(field(selection(step_grouplist66), 'Current_pigql'))) }}];r = load \"FinServWaveExt__Account_Revenue\";r = filter r by date('FinServ__Date__c_Year', 'FinServ__Date__c_Month', 'FinServ__Date__c_Day') in [{{ no_quote(value(field(selection(step_grouplist66), 'Current_pigql'))) }}];z = group r by 'FinServ__Account__c.Id' full, q by 'FinServ__FinancialAccount__c.FinServ__PrimaryOwner__c.Id';z = foreach z generate (case when  r['FinServ__Account__c.Id'] is null then q['FinServ__FinancialAccount__c.FinServ__PrimaryOwner__c.Id'] else r['FinServ__Account__c.Id'] end)  as 'Id', coalesce(sum(q['FinServ__Amount__c']),0) + coalesce(sum(r['FinServ__Amount__c']),0) as 'Amount';z = order z by 'Amount' desc;z = group z by 'Id';z = foreach z generate 'Id' as 'Id', sum('Amount') as 'sum_Amount',sum(sum('Amount')) over([.. 0] partition by all order by sum('Amount')desc) as 'sum_window';z= filter z by 'sum_window' <= {{value(results(Revenue_80))}}; ","measures":[["sum","Amount"],["sum","window"]],"groups":["Id"]}

{"pigql":"q = load \"FinServWaveExt__Opportunity\";q = filter q by date('CloseDate_Year', 'CloseDate_Month', 'CloseDate_Day') in  [{{ no_quote(value(field(selection(step_grouplist66), 'Current_pigql'))) }}];q = filter q by ! ('AccountId' in {{results(Window_function)}});q = filter q by 'IsClosed' == \"false\";q = filter q by 'StageName' != \"Closed Won\";q = group q by 'StageName';q = foreach q generate 'StageName' as 'StageName', sum('Amount') as 'sum_sum_value',(case when sum('Amount') < 0 then \"Red\" when sum('Amount') > 0 then \"Green\" else \"Amber\" end)  as 'Base', count() as 'sum_count';q = order q by 'sum_sum_value' desc;q = limit q 2000;","measures":"{{selection(step_selection_Target1)}}","groups":["StageName","Base"],"filters":[],"order":[[-1,{"ascending":false}]]}

{"pigql":"q = load \"FinServWaveExt__Event_Account_Contact\";q = filter q by 'FinServ__Regarding__c' in {{selection(Regarding__80)}}; q = filter q by 'AccountId.FinServ__PrimaryContact__c.Name' in {{results(FinServ__PrimaryContact__c_Name_84)}};q = filter q by date('ActivityDate_Year', 'ActivityDate_Month', 'ActivityDate_Day') in [{{ no_quote(value(field(selection(step_grouplist99), 'Current_pigql'))) }}];q = filter q by 'AccountId.Id' in {{results(Window_function)}};q = group q by all;q = foreach q generate count() as 'count';","measures":[["count","*"]],"filters":[]}

{"pigql":"qx = load \"FinServWaveExt__Account_Revenue\";qx = group qx by ('FinServ__Account__c.Id','FinServ__Account__c.Name');qx = foreach qx generate 'FinServ__Account__c.Id' as 'Id',sum('FinServ__Amount__c') as 'sum_Revenue','FinServ__Account__c.Name' as 'Name';rx = load \"FinServWaveExt__FinAcc_Revenue\";rx = group rx by ('FinServ__FinancialAccount__c.FinServ__PrimaryOwner__c.Id','FinServ__FinancialAccount__c.FinServ__PrimaryOwner__c.Name');rx = foreach rx generate 'FinServ__FinancialAccount__c.FinServ__PrimaryOwner__c.Id' as 'Id',sum('FinServ__Amount__c') as 'sum_Revenue','FinServ__FinancialAccount__c.FinServ__PrimaryOwner__c.Name' as 'Name'; px = union qx,rx; px = group px by ('Name','Id');px = foreach px generate 'Name' as 'Name',coalesce(sum('sum_Revenue'),0) as 'sum_Revenue';q = load \"FinServWaveExt__Event_Account_Contact\";q = filter q by date('ActivityDate_Year', 'ActivityDate_Month', 'ActivityDate_Day') in [{{ no_quote(value(field(selection(step_grouplist99), 'Current_pigql'))) }}];q = group q by ('AccountId.Id','AccountId.FinServ__PrimaryContact__c.Name');q = foreach q generate 'AccountId.Id' as 'Id','AccountId.FinServ__PrimaryContact__c.Name' as 'Name',count() as 'count';r = load \"FinServWaveExt__Task_Account_Contact\";r = filter r by date('ActivityDate_Year', 'ActivityDate_Month', 'ActivityDate_Day') in [{{ no_quote(value(field(selection(step_grouplist99), 'Current_pigql'))) }}];r = group r by ('AccountId.Id','AccountId.FinServ__PrimaryContact__c.Name');r = filter r by 'TaskSubtype' in [\"Call\", \"Email\", \"Task\"];r = foreach r generate 'AccountId.Id' as 'Id','AccountId.FinServ__PrimaryContact__c.Name' as 'Name',count() as 'count';ACTI = union q,r;ACTI = group ACTI by ('Id','Name');ACTI = foreach ACTI generate 'Name' as 'Name',coalesce(sum('count'),0) as 'sum_count';ccv = union px,ACTI;ccv = group ccv by 'Name';ccv = foreach ccv generate 'Name' as 'Name', coalesce(sum('sum_Revenue'),0) as 'sum_Total_Revenue',coalesce(sum('sum_count'),0) as 'sum_Total_Activities';","measures":[["sum","Total_Revenue",null,{"display":"Total Revenue"}],["sum","Total_Activities",null,{"display":"# of Activities"}]],"groups":["Name"]}

{"pigql":"q = load \"FinServWaveExt__Event_Account_Contact\";q = filter q by date('ActivityDate_Year', 'ActivityDate_Month', 'ActivityDate_Day') in [{{ no_quote(value(field(selection(step_grouplist99), 'Current_pigql'))) }}];q = filter q by 'FinServ__Regarding__c' in {{selection(FinServ__Regarding__c_108)}};q = filter q by 'AccountId.FinServ__PrimaryContact__c.Name' in {{results(FinServ__PrimaryContact__c_Name_84)}};q = filter q by !('AccountId.Id' in {{results(Window_function)}});q = foreach q generate  \"Event\" as 'Activity Types', count() as 'count';r = load \"FinServWaveExt__Task_Account_Contact\";r = filter r by date('ActivityDate_Year', 'ActivityDate_Month', 'ActivityDate_Day') in [{{ no_quote(value(field(selection(step_grouplist99), 'Current_pigql'))) }}];r = filter r by 'FinServ__Regarding__c' in {{selection(FinServ__Regarding__c_108)}};r = filter r by 'AccountId.FinServ__PrimaryContact__c.Name' in {{results(FinServ__PrimaryContact__c_Name_84)}};r = filter r by !('AccountId.Id' in {{results(Window_function)}});r = group r by 'TaskSubtype'; r = foreach r generate 'TaskSubtype' as 'Activity Types',count() as 'count'; ACTI = union q,r; ACTI = group ACTI by 'Activity Types'; ACTI = foreach ACTI generate 'Activity Types' as 'Activity Types' , sum('count') as 'count';","measures":[["count","*"]],"groups":["Activity Types"]}

{"pigql":"q = load \"FinServWaveExt__FinAcc_Revenue\"; q = filter q by date('FinServ__Date__c_Year', 'FinServ__Date__c_Month', 'FinServ__Date__c_Day') in [{{ no_quote(value(field(selection(step_grouplist66), 'Current_pigql'))) }}];r = load \"FinServWaveExt__Account_Revenue\";r = filter r by date('FinServ__Date__c_Year', 'FinServ__Date__c_Month', 'FinServ__Date__c_Day') in [{{ no_quote(value(field(selection(step_grouplist66), 'Current_pigql'))) }}];z = group r by 'FinServ__Account__c.Id' full, q by 'FinServ__FinancialAccount__c.FinServ__PrimaryOwner__c.Id';z = foreach z generate (case when  r['FinServ__Account__c.Id'] is null then q['FinServ__FinancialAccount__c.FinServ__PrimaryOwner__c.Id'] else r['FinServ__Account__c.Id'] end)  as 'Id', coalesce(sum(q['FinServ__Amount__c']),0) + coalesce(sum(r['FinServ__Amount__c']),0) as 'sum_Amount';z = order z by 'sum_Amount' desc;","measures":[["sum","Amount"]],"groups":["Id"]}

parameters.text: Are the Right Clients Getting My Attention?
